content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or experiences, but I can suggest some popular online communities and forums where you can ask for help:

1. Reddit: On Reddit, there are numerous gaming subreddits where you can ask for help, including r/gaming, r/gamers, r/GameHelp, and more. Gamers of all skill levels are usually very willing to help each other out. 2. GameFAQs: GameFAQs is a popular online video game database and message board. It allows users to post questions and share their knowledge with others. 3. Steam Community: If you're playing games on Steam, you can join specific game communities to ask for help or discuss the game with other players. 4. Discord: Discord is a popular chat platform where you can join gaming servers to connect with other players and ask for help. Remember to be respectful and follow the rules of each community or forum when asking for help.
